title: The Year of the Everlasting Storm

sources.title: THE YEAR OF THE EVERLASTING STORM
sources.description: THE YEAR OF THE EVERLASTING STORM With films by Jafar Panahi, Anthony Chen, Malik Vitthal, Laura Poitras, Dominga Sotomayar, David Lowery, and Apichatpong Weerasethakul.

metadata.Plot: Featuring seven stories from seven auteurs from around the world, the film chronicles this unprecedented moment in time, and is a true love letter to the power of cinema and its storytellers.
metadata.Director: Anthony Chen, David Lowery, Jafar Panahi
metadata.Writer: Anthony Chen, David Lowery, Jafar Panahi
metadata.Actors: Yay Yay Bobby Jones, Catherine Machovsky, Zhang Yu
